Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Restores life to mechanical units and structures at the cost of resources.
Root.Name: Repair

Root.Tooltip: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

Root.Tooltip: Multiple SCVs can build a structure, reducing its construction time. Repair has no resource cost.
Root.Name: Advanced Construction

TBl1.Tooltip:
Basic Structure, used to receive collected resources. Can lift off, Can be upgraded into a Orbital Command Center.

Allow:
- SCV
TBl1.Name: Build Command Center

TBl1.Tooltip:
Provide supply for terran forces. Cannot be lifted down or up.
Increase the unit number limit.
Supply depot can be upgraded to Sophisticated Technology Lab, providing upgrades to all combat units.
TBl1.Name: Build Depot

TBl1.Tooltip:
Provide upgrades for Terran Infantry Units.

Allow:
- Upgrade command center to Orbital Command.
TBl1.Name: Build Engineering Bay

TBl1.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl1.Name: Cancel

TBl1.Tooltip:
Air-Defense Structure.

Can attack the air.
Detection unit
TBl1.Name: Build Missile Turret

TBl1.Tooltip: According to SCV Corporal James Wood, UED military Barracks architectural drawings were stolen by a guy named Duran. General Dugal was so angry that he even found ten ladies and a man to vent on that night.
TBl1.Name: Barracks Disabled

TBl1.Tooltip: Improved Refinery that sends refined vespene gas straight to the Command Center via short-range warp fields. Eliminates the need for SCVs in vespene gas production.
TBl1.Name: Build Automated Refinery

TBl1.Tooltip: Defensive structure. Able to protect up to 4 infantry unit slots. Units inside the Bunker have +1 range to their attacks. Bunkers can be salvaged.
TBl1.Name: Build Bunker

TBl1.Tooltip: Defensive structure. Can permanently Mind Control Zerg units.
TBl1.Name: Build Hive Mind Emulator
Build Command Center with Orbital Relay

TBl1.Tooltip: Defensive structure. Able to protect up to 4 infantry unit slots. Units inside the Bunker have +1 range to their attacks. Bunkers can be salvaged.
TBl1.Name: Build Bunker

TBl1.Tooltip:
Automated defensive turret. Damages all enemy ground units in a straight line.

Can attack ground units.
TBl1.Name: Build Railgun Turret

TBl1.Tooltip: Reveals the locations of enemy units at long range. The Sensor Tower's detection area is visible to the enemy.
TBl1.Name: Build Sensor Tower

TBl2.Tooltip:
Provide advanced upgrade licenses for Goliath and Siege Tank in Advanced Tech Lab. Provide weapons and armor upgrade solutions for all units.

Allow:
- Manufacture Siege Tank in Factory.
TBl2.Name: Build Armory

TBl2.Tooltip:
Air unit production facilities .

Allow:
- Viking
- Science Vessel
TBl2.Name: Build Starport

TBl2.Tooltip:
Provides advanced upgrade licenses for Viking, Science Vessel, and Battlecruiser in the Advanced Tech Lab.

Allow:
- Can manufacture Battlecruiser in Starport.
TBl2.Name: Build Fusion Core

TBl2.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl2.Name: Cancel

TBl2.Tooltip: This unit unlocks at Commander Level 6.
TBl2.Name: Build Fusion Core
